classSpec.desc: provides an attribute to indicate whether or not the element concerned is considered to mark the end of an orthographic token in the same way as whitespace.

attDef.desc: indicates whether or not the element bearing this attribute should be considered to mark the end of an orthographic token in the same way as whitespace.

valItem.desc: the element bearing this attribute is considered to mark the end of any adjacent orthographic token irrespective of the presence of any adjacent whitespace
the element bearing this attribute is considered not to mark the end of any adjacent orthographic token irrespective of the presence of any adjacent whitespace
no assertion is made as to whether or not the element bearing this attribute is considered to mark the end of any adjacent orthographic token.
